text: Burgundy School of Business is an European higher studies establishment. The school is in 3 places, in Paris, in Lyon and in Dijon. It has been created in 1899. BSB is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management.L’ESC Dijon change de nom et de stratégie ==References== == Further reading == * BSB website Category:Education in France
title: Burgundy School of Business
